name: Audio In
description: This attribute indicates if the gear accepts external audio signals.

name: Sustain pedal
description: Possibility to connect a sustain pedal

name: Expression pedal
description: Possibility to connect an expression pedal

name: Audio Out
description: This attribute indicates if the gear can send audio signals to external gear.

name: Headphone Output
description: This attribute indicates if you can monitor sound directly via headphones.
descriptionForEdit: Dedicated headphone output present?

name: Microphone Input
description: This attribute shows whether a mic can be connected directly.
descriptionForEdit: Is there a microphone input?

name: Line Input
description: This attribute indicates if line-level audio sources can be connected.
descriptionForEdit: Is there a line-level input?

name: Digital Audio Output
description: This attribute indicates if the gear outputs audio in digital format.
descriptionForEdit: Is there a digital audio output?

name: CV/Gate
description: This attribute shows if it can interface with modular synthesizers.
descriptionForEdit: Does the gear support CV/Gate connections?

name: Width
description: Width of the gear, in mm
descriptionForEdit: Please fill it in metric millimeters. The site will convert it to millimeters or inches, depending on the user setting

name: Height
description: Height of the gear, in mm
descriptionForEdit: Please fill it in metric millimeters. The site will convert it to millimeters or inches, depending on the user setting

name: Depth
description: Depth of the gear, in mm
descriptionForEdit: Please fill it in metric millimeters. The site will convert it to millimeters or inches, depending on the user setting

name: Weight
description: Weight of the gear
descriptionForEdit: Please fill it in metric grams. The site will convert it to kg or lbs, depending on the user setting

name: Native DAW Integration
description: Which DAWs are supported out of the box

name: Preset slots
description: This attribute represents how many preset sounds can be stored for easy recall.
descriptionForEdit: The amount of presets that a user can save. This includes the factory presets.

name: Effects
description: This attribute indicates if the gear includes onboard effects processing.
descriptionForEdit: Whether a gear has built-in effects

name: Performance Controls
description: This attribute details performance-oriented controls like pitch bend or modulation wheels.
descriptionForEdit: Controls that directly affect the sound.

name: Release date
description: The (approximate) date when the product was released.

name: Power Supply Type
description: This attribute specifies how the gear is powered (e.g., AC adapter).

name: USB Powered
description: This attribute indicates if the gear can run off USB power.

name: Battery powered
description: This attribute shows if the gear can operate without external power, using a built in battery.

name: Display Type
description: This attribute indicates the kind of screen (LCD, OLED, etc.).

name: Touch Screen
description: This attribute clarifies if the display is touch-sensitive.

name: Storage Type
description: This attribute specifies the storage medium for saving data.

name: Internal Memory
description: Amount of internal memory for samples or patches, in megabytes.

name: Expandable Memory
description: This attribute shows if additional storage can be added.

name: Built-in speaker
description: Does the gear have a built in speaker

name: Pad Count
description: Number of velocity‐sensitive pads available on the controller.
descriptionForEdit: Enter the number of velocity‐sensitive pads on the device.

name: Fader Count
description: Number of assignable faders present on the controller.
descriptionForEdit: Enter the number of assignable faders on the device.

name: Knob Count
description: Number of assignable knobs available on the controller.
descriptionForEdit: Enter the number of assignable knobs on the device.

name: Encoder Count
description: Number of assignable (endless) rotary encoders present on the controller.
descriptionForEdit: Enter the number of assignable (endless) rotary encoders on the device.

name: Button Count
description: Number of assignable buttons present on the controller.
descriptionForEdit: Enter the number of assignable buttons on the device.

name: Joystick Type
description: Specifies the type of joystick control available.
descriptionForEdit: Describe the joystick type on the device.

name: Transport Controls
description: Indicates whether the controller includes dedicated transport controls (such as play, stop, record).
descriptionForEdit: Does the device have transport controls?

name: Keybed
description: This attribute indicates if the product includes a playable keyboard or input surface.
descriptionForEdit: Whether there is a way to directly enter notes into the gear.

name: Key size
description: For piano keybed: What is the size of the keys?
descriptionForEdit: Only fill in value when it has a piano keybed: What is the size of the keys?

name: Type of keybed
description: This attribute specifies the keybed mechanism or input method.

name: Number of Keys
description: This attribute shows how many keys are available to play notes.

name: Velocity Sensitive
description: This attribute indicates if velocity sensitivity is supported.

name: Aftertouch
description: This attribute specifies the kind of pressure sensitivity after the initial key press.
descriptionForEdit: Type of aftertouch.

name: MIDI Form factor
description: This attribute details the physical MIDI port type.

name: Split zone count
description: The amount of zones that can be assigned to different MIDI channels

name: Layer function
description: Possibility to layer multiple MIDI channels to the same keys

name: Chord mode
description: Whether it's possible to limit to specific specific chords on inputs

name: Scale mode
description: Whether it's possible to limit to specific specific scales on inputs

name: MIDI In
description: This attribute indicates if external MIDI signals can be received.
descriptionForEdit: Is there a dedicated MIDI In port?

name: MIDI Out
description: This attribute shows if the gear can send MIDI data to other gear.
descriptionForEdit: Is there a dedicated MIDI OUT port?

name: MIDI Thru
description: This attribute indicates if the gear can pass MIDI data along unchanged.
descriptionForEdit: Is there a dedicated MIDI THRU port?

name: MIDI over USB
description: This attribute clarifies if MIDI communication is possible via USB.
descriptionForEdit: Does the gear send/receive MIDI over USB?

name: MIDI CC Control Count
description: This attribute specifies the count of adjustable MIDI Control Change values. This value is based on the website https://midi.guide
descriptionForEdit: How many MIDI CC parameters can be controlled?

name: MIDI Channels
description: This attribute shows how many MIDI channels the gear can utilize.

name: MIDI Polyphonic Aftertouch
description: Does it support polyphonic aftertouch via MIDI?

name: Onboard Sampling
description: This attribute shows if the gear can record and store sounds.
descriptionForEdit: Can this gear sample audio internally?

name: Sample Slicing Mode
description: This attribute defines how recorded audio is divided into segments.

name: Sequencer Steps
description: This attribute indicates the length of the sequencer pattern.

name: Arpeggiator
description: This attribute shows if automatic note patterns can be generated.
descriptionForEdit: Does the gear have an arpeggiator?

name: LFO Count
description: This attribute shows how many LFOs are available for modulation.

name: Synthesis Method
description: This attribute describes the fundamental approach to sound creation.

name: Modulation Matrix
description: This attribute indicates if flexible routing of modulation sources and destinations is possible.

name: Unison Mode
description: This attribute shows if multiple voices can be layered on a single note.

name: Semi Modular
description: This attribute indicates if the gear can be patched with external modules using CV/Gate.

name: Synthesis Type
description: This attribute lists the synthesis techniques the gear supports.

name: Polyphony
description: This attribute shows how many voices can sound at once.

name: Multi-timbral
description: This attribute indicates if the gear can produce layered or distinct sounds at once.

name: Oscillator Amount
description: This attribute shows how many oscillators can be used to shape the sound.

name: VCO Amount
description: A Voltage-Controlled Oscillator (VCO) is a synthesizer component that generates waveforms.
descriptionForEdit: This attribute indicates how many VCOs (Voltage-Controlled Oscillator) are available.

name: Waveform Types
description: This attribute lists the wave shapes the oscillators can produce.

name: Filter Type
description: This attribute shows what types of filters are available for shaping the sound.

name: Envelope Generators
description: This attribute indicates how many ADSR or similar envelopes can be used.
